smile.nlp

Class NGram

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.nlp.NGram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<NGram>

    public class NGram
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<NGram>
    An n-gram is a contiguous sequence of n words from a given sequence of text. An n-gram of size 1 is referred to as a unigram; size 2 is a bigram; size 3 is a trigram.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Frequency of n-gram in the corpus.
